name: vega-lib

scripts.postbuild: uglifyjs build/vega.js -c -m -o build/vega.min.js && uglifyjs build/vega-core.js -c -m -o build/vega-core.min.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.pretest: npm run prebuild && npm run rollup
scripts.test: TZ=America/Los_Angeles tape 'test/**/*-test.js' && eslint index.js src test
